resources.string: For trusted Wifi, notification is not shown when phone is out of Bluetooth range
New Features: FindMyPhone alarm, phone out-of-range notification and trust wifi. Click to see details.

Be cautious to select Wifi that you think is secure to leave your phone aside such as home or office Wifi. When connected to trusted wifi, no alert notification will be shown if your phone is out of bluetooth range. Do not add public wifi in trust list as those are usually high risk area of phone loss.

Version 1.0.0.1 : 

1. FindMyPhone alarm. Locate your phone easily with your smart watch. Phone needs to be in Bluetooth or Wifi range. 

2. Phone out-of-bluetooth-range alert. Alert you early before it gets too late. 

3. Trust Wifi. Avoid annoying alerts at your trusted place (Wifi) like home or office where you feel safe to leave phone aside.
